sentence.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination regulates cellular deoxynucleotide levels and acts as a potential tumor suppressor in other leukemias.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Thus, our study considerably extends the picture of pathways involved in molecular pathogenesis of T-PLL and identifies the tumor suppressor gene double-strand break repair via homologous recombination with ~20% of T-PLL affected by destructive lesions likely as major player in T-PLL pathogenesis

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
